{{cpp/numeric/random/geometric_distribution/title|p}}
{{cpp/numeric/random/geometric_distribution/navbar}}
{{ddcl | since=c++11 | 1=
double p() const;
}}

Returns the {{math|p}} distribution parameter the distribution was constructed with. The parameter defines the probability of a trial generating {{c|true}}. The default value is {{c|0.5}}.

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
Floating point value identifying the {{math|p}} distribution parameter.
